UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile with personal and medical information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

HealthData.title: HealthData
HealthData.description: Represents health data collected from the smart toilet sensors.

id.description: Unique identifier for the health data entry.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the data was collected.

isOccupied.description: Indicates if the toilet is currently occupied.

leakageDetected.description: Indicates if a water leak is detected.

waterFlowRate.description: Current water flow rate in L/min.

flushCount.description: Number of flushes in a given period.

chemicalLevel.description: Remaining cleaning chemical level in percent.

isOnline.description: Indicates if the device is connected to the internet.

signalStrength.description: Device network signal strength in percent.

bloodDetected.description: Indicates if blood is detected in urine.

HealthInsight.title: HealthInsight
HealthInsight.description: Represents health insights generated by the AI analysis.

id.description: Unique identifier for the health insight.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the insight was generated.

reasoning.description: The reasoning behind the generated insight.

recommendation.description: A recommendation based on the generated health insight.
